Split Jaw Alligator Heads to Surgery | Gator Boys

April 7, 2021 by Koray Musluer 0 Comments

Animal Planet
Share on Facebook
Share on Twitter
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn
An alligator who had been rescued previously with a split jaw is now healthy enough to undergo surgery – which isn’t without its risks. | For more Gator Boys, visit http://animal.discovery.com/tv/gator-boys/#mkcpgn=ytapl1
